questions: What are the expected properties for a Promo Banner?
What type of data is expected for the "id" property?
What is an example of a valid "media.image" property?
What is an example of a valid "media.text" property?
answer:
## Expected properties.
!!! Tip

    All properties are optional. If any property is missing it will not be processed and no error will be reported.

| Name        | Expected type   | Example                                                      |
|-------------|-----------------|--------------------------------------------------------------|
| id          | string          | 123456          |
| name        | string          | "Promo Banner"        |
| media.image | string          | "http://web.com/banner.jpg" |
| media.text  | string          | "Visit my page"  |
